com.friendsbirthdaysVer5.services

Class StartService

  • java.lang.Object
    • IntentService
      • com.friendsbirthdaysVer5.services.StartService

  • public class StartService
extends IntentService
    This method is started when the StartService() class is called from another class The method checks to see if the App's SharedPrefernces variable (xml file) is set to true, i.e. it has been activated previously. If the variable is true, this class scans the APP database to get information on alarms and notifications to be set in the future and sets them.
